column7: ZenkiTN: I should remark that "Umashika" is a very untranslateable pun. The running joke about Manto being an idiot (馬鹿) reaches its climax here, where Manto can literally cast the Uma(馬)shika(鹿) spell. The etymology of "baka" comes from mistaking horses (uma) for deers (shika).
